name: Android notes app with firebase
description: A modern, lightweight, and user-friendly note-taking mobile application designed for Android devices. Ideal for final-year students and learners looking to showcase full-stack mobile development using Firebase.

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Sign up and log in using Firebase Authentication (Email/Password).

features.title: Cloud Sync
features.description: Notes are automatically synced and stored securely using Cloud Firestore.

features.title: Create, Edit, Delete Notes
features.description: Easy-to-use interface to manage all your personal or academic notes.

features.title: Dark Mode Support
features.description: Built-in toggle to switch between light and dark theme.

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Quickly find notes using a powerful keyword search.

features.title: Offline Support
features.description: Works seamlessly even without internet. Syncs automatically when back online.

features.title: Secure Storage
features.description: Firebase ensures encrypted and safe data handling.
